articles.title: World Health Organization declares global emergency over new coronavirus - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: World Health Organization declares global emergency over new coronavirus The Globe and Mail Coronavirus live updates: World Health Organization declares global health emergency National Post Coronavirus: Death toll rises as virus spreads to every Chinese regi…
articles.content:
The new coronavirus that has swept across China, killing more than 170 people, infecting thousands and prompting unprecedented lockdowns, is now officially a global emergency, according to the World Health Organization.
The director-general of the WHO issued… [+4808 chars]
